00006 // ========================================================================
00007 // RenderObject Implementation
00008 // ========================================================================
00009 RenderObject::RenderObject(PhysicsObject * object, SceneNode * node)
00010     : mp_object(object), mp_node(node)
00011 {
00012 }
00013 
00014 void RenderObject::updateNode(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation)
00015 {
00016     mp_node->setPosition(mp_object->getPosition());
00017     if(mp_object->getType() == ObjectType::PROJECTILE) {
00018         mp_node->setOrientation(camOrientation);
00019     } else {
00020         mp_node->setOrientation(mp_object->getOrientation());
00021     }
00022 }
00023 
00024 PhysicsObject * RenderObject::getObject() {
00025     return mp_object;
00026 }
00027 
00028 SceneNode * RenderObject::getRootNode() {
00029     return mp_node;
00030 }

00033 // ========================================================================
00034 // RenderModel Implementation
00035 // ========================================================================
00036 RenderModel::RenderModel(GameArena& model, SceneManager * mgr) : m_model(model), m_renderList(),
00037     mp_mgr(mgr), m_entityIndex(0)
00038 {
00039     m_model.addGameArenaListener(this);
00040 
00041     // Set up required textures
00042     Plane plane = Plane(Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Z, 0);
00043     MeshManager::getSingleton().createPlane("projSprite", Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME,
00044         plane, 200, 200, 1, 1, true, 1, 1, 1, Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void RenderModel::generateRenderObject(PhysicsObject * object)
00048 {
00049     if(object->getType() == ObjectType::SHIP) {
00050         SceneNode * shipNode = mp_mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00051         std::stringstream oss;
00052         oss << "Ship" << m_entityIndex;
00053         Entity * shipEntity = mp_mgr->createEntity(oss.str(), "RZR-002.mesh");
00054         shipEntity->setCastShadows(true);
00055         shipNode->setScale(6, 6, 6);
00056         SceneNode * shipRotateNode = shipNode->createChildSceneNode();
00057         shipRotateNode->setDirection(Vector3(0, 0, 1));
00058         shipRotateNode->attachObject(shipEntity);
00059 
00060         // Add a spot light to the ship
00061         oss << "L1";
00062         Ogre::Light* spotLight = mp_mgr->createLight(oss.str());
00063         spotLight->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT);
00064         spotLight->setDiffuseColour(0.8, 0.8, 1.0);
00065         spotLight->setSpecularColour(0.2, 0.2, 1.0);
00066         spotLight->setDirection(0, -1, -3);
00067         spotLight->setPosition(Vector3(0, 30, 0));
00068         spotLight->setSpotlightRange(Ogre::Degree(20), Ogre::Degree(45));
00069         shipNode->attachObject(spotLight);
00070         
00071         // Add a point light aboive the ship
00072         oss << "L2";
00073         Ogre::Light* pointLight = mp_mgr->createLight(oss.str());
00074         pointLight->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
00075         pointLight->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 30, 0));
00076         pointLight->setDiffuseColour(0.4, 0.1, 0.1);
00077         pointLight->setSpecularColour(0.4, 0.4, 0.4);
00078         shipNode->attachObject(pointLight);
00079 
00080         RenderObject renderShip = RenderObject(object, shipNode);
00081         m_renderList.push_back(renderShip);
00082         m_entityIndex++;
00083     } else if (object->getType() == ObjectType::PROJECTILE) {
00084         SceneNode * projNode = mp_mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00085 
00086         std::stringstream oss;
00087         oss << "Projectile" << m_entityIndex;
00088         Ogre::Entity* plasmaSprite = mp_mgr->createEntity(oss.str(), "projSprite");
00089         plasmaSprite->setMaterialName("Orewar/PlasmaSprite");
00090         plasmaSprite->setCastShadows(false);
00091         projNode->attachObject(plasmaSprite);
00092 
00093         // Dynamic spot lights on projectiles
00094         oss << "Light";
00095         Ogre::Light* pointLight = mp_mgr->createLight(oss.str());
00096         pointLight->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
00097         pointLight->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0, 60, 0));
00098         pointLight->setDiffuseColour(0.0, 1, 0.0);
00099         pointLight->setSpecularColour(0.2, 0.7, 0.2);
00100         pointLight->setAttenuation(3250, 1.0, 0.0014, 0.000007);
00101         projNode->attachObject(pointLight);
00102         
00103         RenderObject newProj = RenderObject(object, projNode);
00104         m_renderList.push_back(newProj);
00105         m_entityIndex++;
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 void RenderModel::destroyRenderObject(PhysicsObject * object)
00110 {
00111     for(int i = 0; i < m_renderList.size(); i++) {
00112         if(m_renderList[i].getObject() == object) {
00113             mp_mgr->destroySceneNode(m_renderList[i].getRootNode());
00114             m_renderList.erase(m_renderList.begin() + i);
00115         }
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 void RenderModel::updateRenderList(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation)
00120 {
00121     for(int i = 0; i < m_renderList.size(); i++) {
00122         m_renderList[i].updateNode(elapsedTime, camOrientation);
00123     }
00124 }
00125 
00126 void RenderModel::newPhysicsObject(PhysicsObject * object)
00127 {
00128     generateRenderObject(object);
00129 }
00130 
00131 void RenderModel::destroyedPhysicsObject(PhysicsObject * object)
00132 {
00133     destroyRenderObject(object);
00134 }
